title: Chapter 420
body:
Chapter 420

Translated by: Parthios

 

Edited by: Black Jesus

 

----------------------------------

 

Jikuu Mahou chapter 420: Level up

 

 

 

『Level rose to 95. [Recovery magic] is now level 5. [Light magic] is now level 5. [Physical strengthening magic] is now level 6. [Wind magic] is now level 7. [Water magic] is now level 7. [Ice magic] is now level 7. [Earth magic] is now level 7. [Fire magic]  is now level 7. [Lightning magic] is now level 8. [Dark Magic] is now level 8. [Sword Art] is now level 6』

 

......It's long! And then something went up!

 

What level 95! Isn't it going to be too much? Was it that the enemy was strong? Well, it died.

 

Let's check the status for a moment.

 

┌─＜Status＞─

│Name: Maruyama Seiji

│Occupation: SE

│

│Lvl: 95

│HP: 11612

│MP: 40850

│

│Power: 1331 Endurance: 1031

│Skill: 1556 Magic Power: 4085

│

│Skills

│ Information 6, Space-time 6, Physical Strengthening 6, Recovery 5

│ Wind 7, Lightning 8, Water 7, Ice 7, Earth 7, Darkness 8, Fire 7, Light 5

│

│ Taijutsu 3, Swordsmanship 5, Sword Art 6, Dagger Art 4, Stick Art 4

│ Medicine Production 5

└─────────

 

HP is over 10,000! The growth of MP and magic is great too! After all, each magic leveled up after this battle.

 

However, the [Information] and [Space-Time] magic that I was good at the most fell below the average. If my story is an internet fiction, I think it's likely that the title has "Spacetime magic" or something, but it's a title scam.

 

That's why I think so much while watching the status.......

 

「Seiji, something has fallen」

 

The lightning spirit shouts. Looking at the top.......

 

Apparently, it seems that a part of the body of the huge giant octopus that has exploded and scattered has flung to here while falling apart.

 

「Since we may be able to use it for something, why not pick it up?」

 

While sliding on the water, I pick up the piece of grilled octopus that came down.

 

It's like an old game of picking up the falling 『Chikuwa』. (TL Note Chikuwa = tube-shaped fish-paste cake)

 

「Ah, what is that!?」

 

The lightning spirit is noisy. Did it come down with an iron array?

 

「We will accept it all」

 

「「Yes」」

 

The three spirits caught something that came down in cooperation.

 

「Seiji...... this has fallen down」

 

「Isn't it a magic stone?」

 

A magic stone that has fallen from the sky. Perhaps this is the magic stone of the huge octopus.

 

┌─＜Appraisal＞────

│【Flying magic stone】

│You can fly by using magic.

│It is also possible to accompany someone nearby.

│Also, fall damage is completely nullified.

│Rarity: ★★★★★★

└─────────

 

Let's fly...... no, but it's a flying magic stone….... It is a magic stone that seems to be the key to search for a castle in the sky. It was also thanks to that that the huge octopus could float right?

 

「Seiji. What is that stone?」

Lightning spirit is also curious.

 

「Well then, let's use it for a while」

 

When I put magic power into the flying magic stone, my body floated away from the surface of the water.

 

「Oh! You get to fly Seiji!」

 

The spirits circle around me happily who floated up in the air.

 

This is good. Until now, when I was flying, I had to go in a long way. Well, it was bothersome because I had to be naked when I transformed into a dragon.

 

Well, no, I have no hobbies for exposure! Really.

 

While chasing after the sky with the spirits for a long time, the lightning spirit hugged me.

 

「Seiji. It's fast」

Don't say it early!

 

Wind and water spirits also got on my head.

 

「Now, I wonder if I'm going back soon」

 

「Eh, are you going home yet? I want to be with you more」

 

What, the lightning spirit, suddenly became sweetened. I remember Aya when she was small.

 

「Well then, let's fly as it is」

 

「Ou!」「「Yes」」

 

I took the three spirits and flew towards Shinju town with [Flying Magic Stone].

 

-----

 

「The wind is nice」

 

「I guess so」

For some reason, the spirits have a dirty face.

 

When I was flying with a pleasant wind, I passed through the sea, crossed the forest, and saw the city of the royal capital.

 

「It's quite a damage......」

 

The residents had already left the shelter and started their activities.

 

Those who are cleaning up their own homes. Those despaired due to the devastating damage.

 

It seems that troubles such as fights and theft are also occurring.

 

「Castle is......」

As I advanced a little, I saw the castle that was almost completely destroyed.

 

If it had a barrier, it would have been a little better. Well, the refugees had priority, but it's a festival after this.

 

「Seiji! Look! The mountain!」

 

I look at the place pointed by the lightning spirit! The middle part of Mount Fuji is broken a little.

 

There was only one thing all right, even if it collapsed it is not unreasonable. Rather, it is strange to have done to that degree.

 

「Hmm!?」

 

「Seiji. What happened?」

 

「There is something in the place where it broke」

 

I go around a bit and go to the landslide site.

 

「What's thisーーー!」

 

From the bottom of the cliff, you can see a black surface.

 

It seems like a huge thing is buried under the earth.

 

In this feeling, this mountain, the earth is only the surface, and it seems that something black is completely buried under it.

 

「Hey, do you know what it is?」

 

「Don't ask me」

 

For now, let's try an appraisal. ...... No, I can't identify it for some reason.

 

There was a shield that the devils had before, that had been prevented the appraising, but it feels different from that as well.

 

It seems that the magic of appraisal itself has failed.

 

「Seiji. I'm tired, let's go back already」

 

What is it? Didn't you say that you didn't want to go back earlier?

 

I suspended the investigation of the black thing and returned to Shinju town.
